issue.title: [R] clean-up date time unit testing once tzdb is available on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16073](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16073). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are skipping a high number of tests on Windows due to the `tz` database not being available. Once ARROW-13168 is solved, we need to have a thorough look at the skipped tests / reduced functionality.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16073?focusedCommentId=17519758) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
If we haven't done this already, we should definitely do it before the release to catch if we've introduced any regressions with our liberal use of skip on windows...
